casebody.data:
STATE
v.
David SELLERS. No. 406P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 28, 2016. Phillip K. Woods, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. David Sellers, Brunswick, for Sellers, David. C. Ricky Bowman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th of December 2015 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of January 2016."
